betterquesting:10.desc:8:
A prophecy. The Prophecy.
My prophecy.
No, this is not just me. The Meatball Man, the Arbiter, and all the poor souls that have been dragged down through this conflict.
Order and chaos always intertwined, even in this prophecy.
Part of it came from the writs of the Arbiter, concerning my coming to Terra, my affinity to alchemy, my ability to bring back Matter-Energy technology, and my visit to Proxima.
Another part of the prophecy came from the cult of the Lord of Gluttony, now uttered by its Harbinger. A confrontation that must take place, an enmity born from imprisonment. 
Order giving way to Chaos. Chaos giving way to Order.
That is why I was imprisoned. The Lord of Gluttony, fearing I would be the one to follow the steps of the Arbiter (thus becoming order), tried to imprison me, to bend my will into scheme (thus becoming chaos). By retaliating, by finding my freedom, I became the agent of Order. Me arriving to Terra was truly a chance happening, but the actions of the Meatball Man, trying to prevent the Prophecy of the Arbiter, made me into the person the Arbiter had prophecized.
The actions of the Arbiter played as big a role as the Meatball Man's in this. And the Prophecy still holds.
I have been Chaos giving way to Order. At some point, I must be Order giving way to Chaos.
I do not know when that will be, and, unlike what has happened until now, my actions are going what will trigger this happening.
From now on, fate rests on me.
betterquesting:10.name:8: A Prophecy of Order and Chaos
